text:
@AndrewYang https://t.co/OSO56r17j3

either we are being lied to about this sickness by calling it CoronaVirus or it really is a CoronaVirus that has been hyped up so much that FEAR has given it a life of it's own.  We are tired of the political chess game at our expense. KARMA KILLS TOO
